ACTION REPORT

August 9, 2000

The office has been open for two months and much has been accomplished. We now have the office staff completed, maintenance is covered and Murieta’s nite-staff started on Thursday August 3, 2000. Most of the files have been sorted and put up both in the office and in storage. The phones are now working correctly.

Items being done this month:

  1. By August 15, 2000 we will have completed all the repairs due to damage.

  2. The tree trimming started on Monday August 7, 2000.

  3. We should begin cleaning carpets this week.

  4. We have now received bids for repairing/resealing the parking lot. This is to be voted on tonight.

Items to be done next month:

  1. Roofing bids are coming in regarding the repair/replacement of the roofs.

  2. Tile bids are also coming in but are a bit slower.

  3. We are also working on bids for the stripping and resealing of the tiles in the entries of each building.

Items being done by maintenance:

  1. Fountains are all being cleaned and repaired by maintenance.

  2. We have started sorting and organizing the storage areas.

  3. The garbage area’s and dumpsters are being cleaned, one at a time.

Items completed last month:

  1. Staffing is almost complete.

  2. We still need another nite-staff person.

  3. The door on Building 3 is finished. We are ready to do the key and lock exchange.
